name: Run'n Score
description:
Welcome to this strange world where you are a gear-based robot pursed by enemies ! You're running and losing power. Collect power barrels on this way to stay awake !

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39. 

Link to Ludum Dare Game Page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/runn-score

Controls:

  • A or Left Arrow to go left
  • D or Right Arrow to go right
  • S or Down Arrow to get sneaked
  • Space or Up Arrow to jump
